Organization Name: EASTERSEALS NORTH TEXAS (ESNT) | NORTH DALLAS CENTER | OUTPATIENT REHABILITATION
Keywords: Government Services, Independent Living Skills Instruction
Description: Provides speech-language, feeding, occupational and physical therapies for children and adults with birth condition, developmental delay or other limitations.

Organization Name: NORTH TEXAS SNAP (SPECIAL NEEDS ASSISTANCE PARTNERS)
Keywords: Government Services, Independent Living Skills Instruction
Description: North Texas SNAP is dedicated to creating and supporting a variety of programs and services for individuals with intellectual disabilities.

Organization Name: MARYS HOUSE | ARLINGTON SITE | DAY HABILITATION
Keywords: Government Services, Independent Living Skills Instruction
Description: Provides day habilitation facility for adults and children 13 years and older with developmental disabilities. Provides music therapy, independent living skills, social skills training, and recreation therapy including participation in Special Olympics.
